text: Aey Nabi, Jab tumhare paas momin auratein bayt (pledge) karne ke liye aayein aur is baat ka ahad karein ke woh Allah ke saath kisi cheez ko shareek na karengi, chori na karengi, zina na karengi, apni aulad ko qatal na karengi, apne haath paaon ke aage koi bohtan (calumny) ghad kar na layengi, Aur kisi amr-e-maaroof (anything known to be good) mein tumhari nafarmani na karengi, to unse bayt lelo aur unke haqq mein Allah se dua-e-magfirat karo. Yaqeenan Allah darguzar(maaf) farmane wala aur Reham karne wala hai
